channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiTester
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiTester

item.title: CVE-2022-35845|2024-08-03T09:44:22.118Z -- fortinet -- fortitester
item.description: Multiple improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerabilities [CWE-78] in FortiTester 7.1.0, 7.0 all versions, 4.0.0 through 4.2.0, 2.3.0 through 3.9.1 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the underlying shell.
